root: ^In the dim light, you noticed a small casket lodged into the wall of the iconostasis.

c-0: ^You hesitated, unsure whether to approach it.

AfterOpening: ^You opened the casket and were surprised to find a collection of blueprints inside.

c-0: ^You eyes scanned the technical drawings, your mind trying to make sense of the intricate designs.
^These blueprints were for advanced cyberware and cyberprosthetics, designed to improve and empower the human body in ways that were beyond anything you have ever imagined.
^As you studied the blueprints, you realized with a growing sense of horror that they were designed for the priest himself.
^And not just for the priest - for all the supreme power of the church, who secretly wore these cyberprosthetics even as they publicly prohibited their use.
^You knew that the blueprints are the key to your freedom.
